tool_description: From the team that built the original financial summarization model on Hugging Face (>45K downloads on April 2023) here comes the advanced version with even greater performance! Use it and build your personal or commercial apps quickly summarizing thousands of articles!
name: Financial Summarization Advanced
title: Financial Summarization Advanced

api_list.name: summarize
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://financial-summarization-advanced.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "financial-summarization-advanced.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://financial-summarization-advanced.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "financial-summarization-advanced.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
